page.title: 10LEISURE
page.content: We surveyed what activities people do in their spare time in Bramley, Shalford and Wonersh. The most popular pastime in this area is watching television!On television the favourite programmes are Dallas,Wogan and East Enders. Most people watch television in the evening. The next most popular activity was going to pub. The people who went to the pubs the most were the fathers.The cinema isn't as popular as it used to be,as everyone is buying or hiring the films as they come out on video. In our area there aren't many cinemas,the nearest cinema being in Guildford. Sporting activity,although more people are turning to it as an alternative to staying inside,still isn't very popular at the moment. The most popular sport at the moment (cont.)
